rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entryway leading to the living area and kitchen.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern open-plan living space with ample natural light and Vastu-aligned east-west orientation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, serving as a dining space for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen designed in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles for food storage and cooking areas.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Dedicated living space for the servants located on the ground floor with access to a small private bath.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom adjacent to the entrance area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet; oriented to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two additional bedrooms designed for family members or guests, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite master bathroom with modern fixtures, adhering to Vastu guidelines for water placements.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: A shared bathroom facility on the first floor for convenience.
